scene_description_enriched: A figure, likely a prophet or saint, is depicted within a circular frame. The figure wears a pink robe and has a beard and curly hair. They are shown in profile, looking towards the right. The background within the circle is a mix of green and golden hues, suggesting a landscape or divine light. Outside the circle, there are hints of foliage and red circular elements, possibly fruits or flowers. A scroll with illegible text in gold lettering is partially visible, wrapping around the figure.
